title: How black is black (A)
creator_credit: Eat Carpet, LOUD Media Festival of Youth Culture and the Arts, SBS-TV and Jade Woods
brief_description: How much Aboriginal are you?, we are asked by a group of indigenous Australian children. “How black is black” questions the issue of blackness and how much Aboriginality is assumed to be an issue of skin colour. Through a series of stills and colourful action sequences, thirteen year old director Jade Woods presents a film about identity, friendship and race. Soundtrack provided by the Sisters Underground.
